item.title: Google Cloud SSH with OS-Login with YubiKey OpenSC-PKCS11 and Trusted Platform Module (TPM) based keys
item.description: or “How to embed SSH private keys into a Yubikey or TPM”. First off, this is nothing new; its a rehash of decade old tech that i decided to try out since i happens to have a YubiKey Neo and familiarity with Trusted Platform Module on a GCP Shielded VM. Both the Yubikey Neo and TPM have one common capability here which this tutorial covers: embedding an RSA private key inextricably into a hardware device and provide an interface to sign arbitrary data using that key.
